scripts.start: npm run process:other:watch & npm run process:css:watch & npm run process:js:watch && wait
scripts.pkg: npm run clean && npm run process:other && npm run process:css && npm run process:js && zip -q -r build/pkg-$npm_package_version.zip dist
scripts.process:css: mkdir -p dist/styles && npm explore hovercardsshared -- npm run process:css $PWD/dist/styles/
scripts.process:css:watch: mkdir -p dist/styles && npm explore hovercardsshared -- npm run process:css:watch $PWD/dist/styles/
scripts.process:js: npm run process:js:background && npm run process:js:everywhere && npm run process:js:options && npm run process:js:soundcloud-player && npm run process:js:top-frame
scripts.process:js:watch: npm run process:js:background:watch & npm run process:js:everywhere:watch & npm run process:js:options:watch & npm run process:js:soundcloud-player:watch & npm run process:js:top-frame:watch
scripts.process:js:background: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/background-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env | uglifyjs -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/scripts/background-main.js
scripts.process:js:everywhere: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/everywhere-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env | uglifyjs -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/scripts/everywhere-main.js
scripts.process:js:options: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/options-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env | uglifyjs -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/scripts/options-main.js
scripts.process:js:soundcloud-player: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env | uglifyjs -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js
scripts.process:js:top-frame: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/top-frame-main.js -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env | uglifyjs -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/scripts/top-frame-main.js
